summary: Korn is an American rock band from California, formed in 1993. They are known for creating and popularizing the nu metal music genre. The band's original members were James "Munky" Shaffer, Reginald "Fieldy" Arvizu, and David Silveria. Korn's debut album was released in 1994, and they gained mainstream success with their later albums, like "Follow the Leader" and "Issues." They have released many popular albums and won two Grammy Awards. As of 2021, Korn has sold over 40 million records worldwide.
title: Korn
